DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; BOSNIA-HERZEGOVINA ; REBELS TO SEEK UNION WITH SERBIA
DOC.TEXT: Bosnian Serb leaders announced they will formally seek to link their territories with the rump Yugoslavia and Serbian-held parts of Croatia.The move appeared timed to increase Bosnian Serb opposition to an internationally negotiated peace plan that would require the Serbs to give_up nearly a third of the 70 % of Bosnia they control . Bosnian Serbs are to vote on the proposal Aug . 27-28 . The rebels also withdrew permission for the evacuation of dangerously ill women and children from the Muslim enclave of Gorazde .
